effect.Name: Duo Recolor Monochrome Tint-To-White (Switch)
effect.description: The effect converts colors to monochrome, but the darker the luminance, the closer the output color will be to the selected color, and the higher the luminance, the closer the output color will be to white.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Duo Recolor Monochrome Tint-To-White (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (13.09.2025) */
parameter.description: The effect converts colors to monochrome, but the darker the luminance, the closer the output color will be to the selected color, and the higher the luminance, the closer the output color will be to white.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines what the base should be. Setting it to 0 sets the base as the texture of the object on which the effect is applied, and setting it to 1 sets this as the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Color
parameter.description: This variable specifies the selected color for the monochrome output.

parameter.name: Color Shadow
parameter.description: This variable specifies the selected color for the monochrome output. Decides what color should appear for darker colors.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
